ED_Title: Observer status for the Global Environment Facility in the General Assembly
ED_DecisionText:
At its 67th plenary meeting, on 7 December 2017, the General Assembly, on the recommendation of the Sixth Committee,  decided to defer a decision on the request for observer status for the Global Environment Facility in the Assembly until the seventy-third session of the Assembly.


(See A/72/477, para. 8; A/72/PV.67)
ED_Disclaimer: The final text of this decision will be contained in document A/72/49 (Vol. II) after editorial review.
